attributes.action: Refuse Admission in our Country of Guantanamo Inmates
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Proposals are suggested that inmates of Guantanamo Bay should be housed in our over stretched infrastructure.
We the undersigned refuse this outragous suggestion on an already over populated Island.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
